newsitem.title: USA: Central Maine Power Co Q3 net falls.
newsitem.headline: Central Maine Power Co Q3 net falls.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
(All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: 1996 results reflect higher maintenance costs, increased power replacement expenses and other costs associated with the company's investments in nuclear units and other one-time charges.
1995 12 month period ended September 30 includes a charge from a $100 million pre-tax writeoff of certain regulatory assets.
